mapper.insert:
SELECT accommodation_seq.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
insert into accommodation (aid, aname, aloc, aprice, apoint, atype, apeople, mseq, anotice, ax, ay) values (#{aid}, #{aname},#{aloc},#{aprice},#{apoint},#{atype},#{apeople}, #{mseq},#{anotice},#{ax},#{ay})

insert into accomoption (oid,aid, rnum,wifi ,tnum , bnum, wave,refg , bd,tv ,pet ,kitchen ,wash ,parking ,fire , smoking,roof,bbq) values (accomoption_seq.nextval, #{aid},#{rnum},#{wifi},#{tnum},#{bnum},#{wave},#{refg},#{bd},#{tv},#{pet},#{kitchen},#{wash},#{parking},#{fire},#{smoking},#{roof},#{bbq})
insert into utility (utid, aid, ures, ucafe, ucon,uact) values (utility_seq.nextval,#{aid}, #{ures},#{ucafe},#{ucon},#{uact})
